developed_by: This App was developed by Omar Sabri.
all_data_come: All data is being retrieved from the website (corona.ps), which is the official website monitored by the  ministry of health in Palestine.
app_info:
This App made to be a handy way to get all recent updates about corona cases in Palestine, just a click away from your fingers!
All represented data is coming from it's official sources.
App refreshes each time you enters the App.
made_possible_by:
This App is made possible by the help of many people, so BIG special thanks for each single one of them!
Samer Nazzal: Provided API's with explanation.
Hamza Sabri: Data entry and technical support.
Abeer Sabri: Data Entry.
fever_subtitle: High fever that could reach about 39 CÂ°, last for 3-4 days.
breath_subtitle: Breathing is getting more strained and struggle to breath.
tired_subtitle: Feeling tired easily, and pain in the muscles.
cough_subtitle: Cough is dry and persistent, you may feel even more short of breath as your body struggles to get enough oxygen.
diarrhoea_subtitle: Going to the bathroom more than usual.
stay_home: Stay home as much as you can
feel_sick: Feeling sick? call to get medical treatment
